name: AppointmentCity.com
tag_list: appointment-setting, health-care, appointment-scheduling, open-hours-marketing, provider-marketing, search-engine-marketing, dentist, chiropractor, therapist, acupuncturist, veterinarian, personal-trainer, urologist, plastic-surgeon, massage-therapist, ge
overview:
AppointmentCity.com is a way for individuals to find a qualified healthcare provider and book an appointment online in much the same way people book hotel rooms or airline tickets, an Opentable.com for healthcare providers if you will.

Founded in 2009, AppointmentCity.com is an online service for patients and prospective patients who are looking to find an appointment with the right healthcare service provider and to make an informed decision before even stepping into the providerâ€™s office. AppointmentCity.com does this through a real-time scheduling application, online profiles which showcase a providerâ€™s specialty, education and qualifications and a provider rating system. The system also helps service providers grow their practice, reduce cancellations and provide that extra level of convenience to their patients and clients. After initially concentrating on dentistry, AppointmentCity recently expanded their coverage to 18 additional health care categories â€“ everything from chiropractors, plastic surgeons and person trainers to veterinarians and general physicians. As a startup company in a rapid growth phase, AppointmentCity is currently comprised of 6 employees and risingâ€¦..Where appointments wait for you. www.appointmentcity.com
